doc.title: Havana Heat
doc.plot: Havana is a mysterious, sensuous city with gorgeous architecture, white Caribbean beaches, hot, pulsating music, vintage American automobiles and some of the most beautiful women in the world. CID Special Agent Sean Franklin and his partner, gung ho rookie, NCIS Special Agent Brenda Evans are assigned undercover in Havana after another agent is murdered. At the same time, a heavyweight fight between American Ruben Cody and Cuba's Kid Carlos becomes an international incident when a girl Ruben meets in a salsa club is found dead. Sean and Brenda team up with National Revolutionary Police Force Detective Jose Aguillerra to uncover the mystery behind both crimes.
